
tableC
Correlation Table

#### Description

Correlations printed in a nicely formatted table.

#### Usage

<pre><code>
tableC(.data, ..., cor_type = "pearson", na.rm = FALSE, rounding = 3,
output = "text", booktabs = TRUE, caption = NULL, align = NULL,
float = "htb")
</code></pre>

#### Arguments
.data
...
cor_type
na.rm
rounding
output
booktabs
caption
align
float
